languages.text: "Госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио, уже уходите? К сожалению, придется подождать... подождать, да... Видите — общинные службы Футфола проводят плановую проверку систем жизнеобеспечения. Это ненадолго! На час, два..."

traits.locale_text: "Госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио, уже уходите? К сожалению, придется подождать... подождать, да... Видите — общинные службы Футфола проводят плановую проверку систем жизнеобечпечения. Это ненадолго! На час, два..."

languages.text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."
languages.original_text: "Госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио, уже уходите? К сожалению, придется подождать... подождать, да... Видите — общинные службы Футфола проводят плановую проверку систем жизнеобеспечения. Это ненадолго! На час, два..."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's the Footfall communal services, see, they are running a scheduled inspection of life support systems. It won't take long! An hour maybe, or two..."

"{mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's the Footfall communal services, see, they are running a scheduled inspection of life support systems. It won't take long! An hour maybe, or two..."

"{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall station services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

"{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall station services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

"{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

languages.text: “菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，你这就要走了吗？恐怕你得再……再等一会儿，没错……你看，落脚港正在进行检修，他们在对生命维持系统进行定期检查。你不用等太久！一个小时……或者两个小时，应该就够了……”
languages.original_text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

traits.locale_text: “菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，你这就要走了吗？恐怕你得再……再等一会儿，没错……你看，落脚港正在进行检修，他们在对生命维持系统进行定期检查。你不用等太久！一个小时……或者两个小时，应该就够了……”

languages.text: «Maestr{mf|o|a} Fidelio, ¿ya se marcha? Me temo que tendrá que esperar... esperar, sí... por los servicios de la estación de Paso, ¿sabe? Es que están con una inspección programada de los sistemas de soporte vital. ¡Pero no tardarán! Estará apañado en cosa de una hora o dos...».
languages.original_text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

traits.locale_text: «Maestr{mf|o|a} Fidelio, ¿ya se marcha? Me temo que tendrá que esperar... esperar, sí... por los servicios de la estación de Paso, ¿sabe? Es que están con una inspección programada de los sistemas de soporte vital. ¡Pero no tardarán! Estará apañado en cosa de una hora o dos...».

languages.text: 「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ、もうお帰りで？恐れ入りますが、今しばらくお待ちいただけるでしょうか…ええ、ほんの少しだけ…フットフォール・ステーションでの業務が残っておりまして、生命維持装置の定期点検を実施しているところなんで。長くはかかりませんよ！1時間、長くても2時間ほどです…」
languages.original_text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ、もうお帰りで？恐れ入りますが、今しばらくお待ちいただけるでしょうか…ええ、ほんの少しだけ…フットフォール・ステーションでの業務が残っておりまして、生命維持装置の定期点検を実施しているところなんで。長くはかかりませんよ！1時間、長くても2時間ほどです…」

languages.text: "{mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio, Ihr geht schon? Ich fürchte, Ihr werdet warten müssen ...ja, warten ... Wisst Ihr, die Stationsverwaltung von Footfall führt eine angekündigte Inspektion der Lebenserhaltungssysteme durch. Es wird nicht lange dauern! Eine Stunde, vielleicht zwei ..."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio, Ihr geht schon? Ich fürchte, Ihr werdet warten müssen ...ja, warten ... Wisst Ihr, die Stationsverwaltung von Footfall führt eine angekündigte Inspektion der Lebenserhaltungssysteme durch. Es wird nicht lange dauern! Eine Stunde, vielleicht zwei ..."

languages.text: « Vous nous quittez déjà, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio ? J'ai bien peur qu'il vous faille patienter... oui, patienter... Vous voyez, les services de Castel procèdent actuellement à une inspection programmée des systèmes de survie de la station. Ça ne sera pas long ! Une heure, deux tout au plus... »
languages.original_text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous nous quittez déjà, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio ? J'ai bien peur qu'il vous faille patienter... oui, patienter... Vous voyez, les services de Castel procèdent actuellement à une inspection programmée des systèmes de survie de la station. Ça ne sera pas long ! Une heure, deux tout au plus... »

languages.text: "Hemen mi gidiyorsunuz Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}? Maalesef beklemeniz gerekecek... Evet, şey... Binliman İstasyonu Hizmetleri, yaşam destek sistemlerinde planlanmış bir teftiş gerçekleştirecek. Fazla sürmez! Bir saat, bilemediniz iki."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, are you leaving already? I'm afraid you'll have to wait... wait, yes... It's Footfall Station Services, see, they're carrying out a scheduled inspection of the life support systems. It won't take long! An hour, maybe two..."

traits.locale_text: "Hemen gidiyor musunuz {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio? Korkarım ki beklemeniz... Beklemeniz gerekecek, evet... Binliman İstasyonu Hizmetleri, hayat destek sistemlerinde planlanmış bir teftiş gerçekleştirecek. Fazla uzun sürmez! Bir saat, bilemediniz iki..."
